Topic: Scopes 1 & 2: Help integrated stores become carbon neutral by 2040

Indicators: Scope 1 + Scope 2 GHG emissions (in tCO2eq., market based)
Scope 1 + 2 GHG emissions (in tCO2eq., market based)
Reduction of Scope 1 + 2 GHG emissions vs. 2019 (in tCO2eq., market based)
Reduction of Scope 1 GHG emissions vs. 2019 (in tCO2eq., market based)
Reduction of Scope 2 GHG emissions vs. 2019 (in tCO2eq., market based)

Topic: Renewable electricity supply for integrated stores

Indicators: Percentage of renewable electricity in total electricity consumed (%)
Number of sites equipped with solar panels for self-consumption (units)
Square metres of solar panels deployed in car parks and stores (sq.m.)
Number of Power Purchase Agreements (PPA) signed (units)
Renewable energy supply through Power Purchase Agreements (in MWh by 2030 based on PPAs already signed)
